workflow_rationale: Read-only exploratory task focused on analyzing and documenting the current state of codebase organization across all 4 packages (database, server, shared, client) and root directory. No code changes - only assessment and reporting.

phases.name: Complete Directory Inventory
phases.description: Survey entire monorepo structure and create comprehensive file inventory

subtasks.notes: Generated complete directory tree structure. Found 696 files across 92 directories (excluding node_modules and .git). Project structure includes 4 packages (database, server, shared, client) in packages/, root config files, e2e tests, scripts, nginx config, docs, extensive planning documentation in .planning/, and Claude Code tooling in .claude/

Root-level file inventory completed. Found 92 files categorized as: 14 config files (docker-compose, package.json, pnpm-workspace.yaml, tsconfig, .env examples, .gitignore, playwright.config.ts), 13 markdown docs (README.md + 12 others), 11 Playwright test specs (.spec.ts), 17 JS test/utility scripts (.mjs), 4 shell scripts (.sh), 31 screenshot images (.png), 2 other files (.auto-claude-status, .git worktree link). Key observation: Many test files and screenshots at root level should likely be moved to e2e/ or screenshots/ directories.

verification.command: ls -la packages/ && ls -la packages/database && ls -la packages/server && ls -la packages/client && ls -la packages/shared

subtasks.notes: Verified all 4 packages exist: database (Drizzle ORM, migrations), server (Express/tRPC), client (React/Vite), shared (common types/utils). Found misplaced test files in server/ and client/ root directories.

phases.name: File Location Analysis
phases.description: Analyze file locations against monorepo and TypeScript best practices

subtasks.notes: Identified 39 total misplaced test files: 28 at root level (11 .spec.ts, 14 test-*.mjs, 3 test-*.sh), 9 in packages/server root, 1 in packages/client root, 1 in packages/database root. Documented all files with recommended locations.

Identified 13 root-level markdown files. PROPERLY PLACED (1): README.md. ACCEPTABLE AT ROOT (2): ROADMAP.md (95KB, high-visibility), TODO_MASTER.md (99KB, master task list). MISPLACED - should be in docs/deployment/ (2): DOCKER.md, REDIS_SETUP.md. MISPLACED - should be in .planning/phases/ (2): PHASE_2_CHATBOT_AI.md, TEST_RESULTS_PHASE_2.5.md. MISPLACED - should be in .planning/ (2): MIGRATION_PLAN_TALENTS.md, STATUS_CURRENT.md. MISPLACED - should be in docs/ (4): AI_ACTIONS_VALIDATION.md, INTEGRATION_VCARD.md, TRACKS_ARCHITECTURE.md, test-search-manual.md. Total: 10 misplaced documentation files out of 13 root-level markdown files. Proper doc locations exist: docs/deployment/, .planning/, e2e/README.md, nginx/README.md.

subtasks.description: Identify misplaced image and media files
subtasks.notes: Identified 31 misplaced image files at root level. All are PNG test screenshots that should be in screenshots/ directory. File patterns: global-setup-*.png (2), homepage.png, register-*.png (3), stripe-checkout-error.png, test-booking-*.png (5), test-login-*.png (5), test-signup-*.png (5), validation-*.png (10). PROPERLY PLACED: screenshots/ (27 files), .playwright-mcp/ (14 files), .planning/phases/*/screenshots/ (documentation screenshots). NO other media types found (mp3, mp4, wav, pdf). Client package has no image assets.

Identified 20 misplaced scripts at root level (excluding start.sh which is valid):

**UTILITY SCRIPTS - should be in scripts/ (3):**
- create-booking-and-get-checkout.mjs
- get-stripe-checkout-url.mjs
- hash-password.mjs

**PLAYWRIGHT TEST SCRIPTS - should be in e2e/ (14):**
- test-booking-flow.mjs, test-chatbot-playwright.mjs, test-chatbot-simple.mjs
- test-chatbot.mjs, test-client-login-flow.mjs, test-client-portal.mjs
- test-production-validation.mjs, test-profile-page.mjs, test-register.mjs
- test-responsive-sidebar.mjs, test-signup-debug.mjs, test-signup-flow.mjs
- test-stripe-checkout.mjs, test-stripe-payment.mjs

**SHELL TEST SCRIPTS - should be in scripts/tests/ (3):**
- test-billing.sh, test-login-api.sh, test-no-500-errors.sh

PROPERLY PLACED: start.sh (startup script valid at root)

verification.instructions: Verify each package has src/, package.json, tsconfig.json at expected locations

subtasks.notes: Package structure compliance verified. All 4 packages have required core structure (src/, package.json, tsconfig.json). client: 1 misplaced file, database: 7 misplaced files, server: 9 misplaced files, shared: fully compliant (0 issues). Total: 17 files need relocation within packages.

phases.name: Issue Detection
phases.description: Detect orphaned files, duplicates, and convention violations

verification.instructions: Review file list for files with unclear purpose or outdated files

subtasks.notes: Detected 21 orphaned files across 6 categories: 1 backup file (.bak), 7 one-off database scripts with hardcoded connections (tenant_4, VPS IP), 1 one-off fix script (fix-tenant-7.ts), 6 debug screenshots with timestamps, 2 debug test files at root, and 1 archived error screenshot. Also identified 2 potentially orphaned files for review. Documented identification criteria and recommendations for each category.

Duplicate file detection completed. Analyzed all files with duplicate names across the codebase.

**SUMMARY:**
- Found 25+ files with duplicate names across the project
- 24 are EXPECTED duplicates (normal for monorepo architecture):
  - Config files: package.json (5), tsconfig.json (5), vitest.config.ts (2)
  - Entry points: index.ts (8)
  - Docker: Dockerfile variants (6 total, 2 per deployable package)
  - README.md (4), setup.ts (2), migration files (4)
  
- 5 pairs have same name but DIFFERENT purposes (NOT duplicates):
  - utils.ts: client (Tailwind helper) vs shared (general utils)
  - trpc.ts: client (React setup) vs server (tRPC init)
  - client-portal-auth.ts: router vs utils
  - superadmin.ts: middleware vs router
  - schema.ts: master vs tenant DB schemas

**ACTUAL ISSUE FOUND (1):**
- homepage.png: exists at both root (21KB) and screenshots/ (6KB)
  - Different file sizes indicate different content
  - Root-level file is MISPLACED (already flagged in subtask-2-3)
  
**CONCLUSION:** No true content duplicates requiring consolidation. The monorepo structure properly separates concerns with appropriately named files in different contexts.

verification.instructions: Verify dist/, node_modules/, .env are properly gitignored

subtasks.notes:
Verified .gitignore coverage is comprehensive. All required patterns are properly covered:
- dist/, node_modules/, .env - VERIFIED
- Build outputs, logs, IDE configs - VERIFIED
- Database files, temp files, OS files - VERIFIED
- Drizzle migrations with smart exceptions for master/tenant - VERIFIED

No changes needed - .gitignore follows best practices for Node.js/TypeScript monorepo.

verification.instructions: Verify monorepo configs at root, service configs at package level

subtasks.notes:
Configuration file location verification completed.

**FINDINGS - ALL CONFIGS PROPERLY PLACED:**

✅ ROOT-LEVEL MONOREPO CONFIGS (14 files):
- Docker Compose files (4): docker-compose.yml, .dev.yml, .monitoring.yml, .production.yml
- pnpm workspace files (2): pnpm-workspace.yaml, pnpm-lock.yaml
- Root package.json with workspace scripts
- Base tsconfig.json (extended by packages)
- Environment templates (2): .env.example, .env.production.example
- E2E config: playwright.config.ts

✅ PACKAGE-LEVEL SERVICE CONFIGS:
- client (9): package.json, tsconfig.json, vite.config.ts, tailwind.config.ts, postcss.config.js, .eslintrc.cjs, .env.example, nginx.conf, Dockerfiles (3)
- server (5): package.json, tsconfig.json, vitest.config.ts, .env.example, Dockerfiles (3)
- database (6): package.json, tsconfig.json, vitest.config.ts, drizzle.config.*.ts (3)
- shared (2): package.json, tsconfig.json

✅ INFRASTRUCTURE CONFIGS:
- nginx/production.conf - VPS reverse proxy config
- e2e/global-setup.ts - Playwright setup
- scripts/ - Deployment scripts

**KEY ARCHITECTURAL NOTES:**
1. Two nginx configs serve different purposes (NOT duplicates):
   - packages/client/nginx.conf → Docker container SPA server
   - nginx/production.conf → VPS SSL/reverse proxy

2. Environment file hierarchy properly structured:
   - Root level → Docker Compose / all services
   - Package level → Service-specific vars

**CONCLUSION: NO CONFIGURATION FILE LOCATION ISSUES DETECTED**
All 36+ configuration files follow monorepo best practices.

phases.name: Generate Audit Report
phases.description: Create comprehensive markdown report with findings and recommendations

subtasks.description: Create audit report with executive summary
subtasks.notes:
Created comprehensive 424-line audit report (file-organization-audit-report.md) containing:

**Report Sections:**
- Executive Summary with overall assessment (NEEDS IMPROVEMENT)
- Directory Structure Overview with tree visualization
- Detailed Findings for 6 issue categories
- Statistics section with counts and compliance scores
- Prioritized Recommendations with specific file actions
- Conclusion with estimated 1-hour cleanup effort

**Key Metrics Documented:**
- Total files: 696 across 92 directories
- Misplaced files: 101 (39 tests, 31 screenshots, 20 scripts, 10 docs)
- Orphaned files: 21 (should be deleted)
- True duplicates: 1 (homepage.png)
- Configuration files: 36+ (all properly placed)
- Overall compliance: 60% (4/10 areas need cleanup)

**Verification Passed:**
- Report file exists with 424 lines
- All 5 required sections present
- Git commit: 853e5f5

verification.instructions: Verify report includes specific file locations and recommended destinations

subtasks.notes:
Enhanced audit report with comprehensive Appendix A: Detailed File Relocation Guide (193 new lines).

Added explicit path mappings for all 101 misplaced files:
- A.1: 28 root-level test files → e2e/ with specific subdirectories (auth/, features/, infrastructure/, etc.)
- A.2: 11 package-level test files with exact src/__tests__/ destinations
- A.3: 31 root-level screenshots → screenshots/
- A.4: 3 utility scripts → scripts/
- A.5: 10 documentation files with specific doc destinations
- A.6: 6 database orphaned scripts (marked for deletion)
- A.7: 9 orphaned files with deletion justifications

Each misplaced file now has explicit "current location → recommended destination" mapping.

Verification: Report increased from 424 to 617 lines. Commit: f97fdbf

verification.instructions: Report includes: total files, packages, misplaced count, orphaned count

subtasks.notes:
Verified statistics and compliance assessment in audit report:

**Key Metrics Present:**
- Total Files: 696
- Packages: 4 (all properly structured)
- Misplaced Files: 101 (39 tests, 31 screenshots, 20 scripts, 10 docs)
- Orphaned Files: 21
- True Duplicates: 1
- Configuration Files: 36+ (all properly placed)

**Statistics Section Contains:**
- File Distribution by Location table (all 4 packages + root)
- Issue Summary table with counts and severity levels

**Convention Compliance Section Contains:**
- 10 convention checks with PASS/FAIL status
- Overall Compliance Score: 60% (4/10 areas need cleanup)

All verification criteria met: report includes total files, packages, misplaced count, orphaned count.

subtasks.description: Verify no files were modified during audit
subtasks.notes:
Verification PASSED: Zero source code files were modified during the audit.

**Git Status Analysis:**
- Modified files: Only auto-claude tracking/metadata files (.auto-claude-status, memory/*.json, task_logs.json)
- These are expected modifications for audit progress tracking
- Excluding auto-claude files: 0 source files modified

**Audit Report Status:**
- file-organization-audit-report.md created and committed (commits 853e5f5, f97fdbf, 899851a)
- Report contains 617 lines with all required sections

**Verification Command Results:**
- `git status --short | grep -v '^\?\?' | grep -v 'file-organization-audit-report.md' | grep -v '\.auto-claude' | wc -l` → 0

**Conclusion:** The file organization audit was completed as a read-only investigation. All project source files remain unchanged, fulfilling the specification requirement that 'No files were modified during the audit process'.

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential execution required - each phase depends on previous analysis
parallelism.reasoning: Investigation workflow requires sequential execution: inventory → analyze → detect issues → report

acceptance_criteria: All 4 packages audited (database, server, shared, client)
Misplaced files identified with specific locations
No files modified (git working tree clean except report)

verification_steps.name: No Modifications Made
verification_steps.expected_outcome: Only report file appears as untracked (no modified files)

verification_strategy.reasoning: Trivial risk level - read-only audit with zero code modifications. Minimal validation ensures report completeness and accuracy without requiring tests or deployments.

qa_signoff.summary: All QA acceptance criteria verified and passed: 16/16 subtasks completed, comprehensive 617-line audit report created with all required sections, all 4 packages audited, no source files modified (read-only constraint maintained)
